document_data.caption: A map showing the Neck east of the Dragonmere.
document_data.name: Neck
document_data.mainbody: The '''Neck''' was a small strait that connected the [[Dragonmere]] in the west with the [[Sea of Fallen Stars]] in the east.
document_data.Geography: The Neck also served as part of the border between [[Cormyr]] and [[Sembia]].
